urls.title: Anglian Pass being developed for boaters
urls.description: Boaters will have the option to purchase an 'Anglian Pass' which will allow them to navigate unrestricted across neighbouring navigations.

tweets.text:
Coming soonüö®

A new Anglian Pass for boaters in East Angliaüö§

This will allow boaters to move between different waterways without having to pay multiple registration fees. The price of the pass will cover this.

Read more: https://t.co/TYs3mmUigM #Boat #waterways

Less than a week to go until #WorldWetlandsDay! 
Did you know, since the 1700s we have lost 90% of the world‚Äôs wetlands, and 25% of all wetland species face extinction. 
For everyone‚Äôs sake, we must stop destroying our wetlands and start protecting them.
